content: dress crochet from the top down with round yoke lace pattern and short sleeves in drops safran size s - xxxl drops design pattern no e-263 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- size s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl materials drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 500-550-600-650-700-750 g color 50 ice blue drops hook size 3 5 mm/e/4 - or size needed to get 21 double crochets x 12 row = 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 vertically
